name: Alphape
description:
new alphape update 1.13 includes

  • macOS support
  • bug fixes
  • fps counter
  • spear count reduced to 4 
  • cannot gain more than 4 spears from bananas
  • spear velocity increased from 37 -> 40

This is a singleplayer/ multiplayer game where u play as a gorilla and you have to battle other gorillas to climb the social hierarchy.

Fun mechanics such as sliding,swinging, and bhopping

Stretched res supported 

controls :

leftclick - throw spear

rightclick - swing

ctrl - slide

wasd - movement

esc - menu

g - grab nearest spears
